name: Close Operation
description: The operation $close finishes the e-prescription workflow and creates a receipt. The Output of this operation is a Bundle, which is storedy by the prescription server in Task.output. The status of the Task then changes into 'completed'

parameter.name: secret
parameter.documentation: The Operation gets as input the secret Parameter inside of the URL. This paramter must be equal to the value stored in Task.identifier:Secret. Otherwise the Operation aborts with an error.

parameter.name: Receipt
parameter.documentation: The receipt Bundle contains the MedicationDispense resource and the signature.
